vulnerabilities.description: Data from `redirect_to in views.py:25` may be used in an open redirect via `views.py:37`.
vulnerabilities.short_description: Data from `redirect_to in views.py:25` may be used in an open redirect via `views.py:37`.

vulnerabilities.description: Possibility for Cross-site scripting (XSS) when the http data at `form in views.py:16` is returned to the user via `views.py:20` without sanitization.
vulnerabilities.short_description: Possibility for Cross-site scripting (XSS) when the http data at `form in views.py:16` is returned to the user via `views.py:20` without sanitization.

vulnerabilities.description: Data from `views.py:42` may be used in an open redirect via `views.py:68`.
vulnerabilities.short_description: Data from `views.py:42` may be used in an open redirect via `views.py:68`.

vulnerabilities.description: Data from `views.py:26` may be used in an open redirect via `views.py:28`.
vulnerabilities.short_description: Data from `views.py:26` may be used in an open redirect via `views.py:28`.
Security Misconfiguration with the config `PREFERRED_URL_SCHEME` not set to the recommended value `https` for production use
vulnerabilities.description: Security Misconfiguration with the config `PREFERRED_URL_SCHEME` not set to the recommended value `https` for production use
vulnerabilities.recommendation:
Flask application is not configured correctly for deployment to production and live environments. Default settings that are more appropriate for development environment are in use.

NOTE: Some recommended settings may have to be set for every route even when using blueprint design pattern.

## Additional information

**[OWASP-A6](https://owasp.org/www-project-top-ten/OWASP_Top_Ten_2017/Top_10-2017_A6-Security_Misconfiguration)**

**[Flask Security](https://flask-security.readthedocs.io/en/develop/configuration.html)**

**[Flask Security Considerations](https://flask.palletsprojects.com/en/1.1.x/security/#security-considerations)**

**[Flask Configuration](https://flask.palletsprojects.com/en/1.1.x/api/#configuration)**

vulnerabilities.recommendation:
Flask application is not configured correctly for deployment to production and live environments. Default settings that are more appropriate for development environment are in use.

NOTE: Some recommended settings may have to be set for every route even when using blueprint design pattern.

**[Flask Configuration](https://flask.palletsprojects.com/en/1.1.x/api/#configuration)**

vulnerabilities.short_description: Consider adding Flask-Security and Flask-Talisman security extensions to your Flask apps
vulnerabilities.description: Consider adding Flask-Security and Flask-Talisman security extensions to your Flask apps
vulnerabilities.recommendation:
Flask-Security allows you to quickly add common security mechanisms to your Flask application. Flask-Social can also be used to add social or OAuth login and connection management.
